meanings.definition: To snore louder than someone else.
meanings.sent1: My dad outsnores everyone in the house.
meanings.sent2: During the sleepover, Tim outsnores his friends.
meanings.sent3: The cat outsnores the dog, making the whole family laugh.
meanings.sent4: His snoring outsnores the sound of the thunderstorm outside.
meanings.sent5: The bear in the cave outsnores all the other animals in the forest.

meanings.sent1: She always outsnores her brother during nap time.
meanings.sent2: The old man outsnores everyone in the retirement home.
meanings.sent3: The owl outsnores the other birds in the quiet night.
meanings.sent4: His snoring outsnores the sound of the passing train.
meanings.sent5: The giant in the story outsnores all the other characters with his loud snoring.

meanings.definition: The act of snoring louder than others.
meanings.sent1: His outsnores can be heard from the other room.
meanings.sent2: The outsnores of the bear echoed through the forest.
meanings.sent3: The outsnores of the elephant woke up the entire zoo.
meanings.sent4: The outsnores of the giant shook the whole village.
meanings.sent5: The outsnores of the dragon were so loud, they scared away all the other creatures.
